snippet.title: Metal Max Xeno Reborn - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1637230/Metal_Max_Xeno_Reborn

Celebrating 30 Years of 'Metal Max'!

Post-Apocalyptic Open World in 'Metal Max Xeno: Reborn' Coming to is coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam in 2022!

Humanity is on the brink of extinction and the last remaining survivors look to push back against the machines. 
 Half a century ago of war against the mother computer NOA has reduced even Asia's largest metropolis, Tokyo (named TOKIO), to rubble.
 Explore this desolate wasteland and battle your way through onslaughts of enemies. Salvage, modify and hit back using tanks, weaponry and faithful battle dog, Pochi, to reclaim a future for the human race!

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/

#JRPG #tanks #metalmax #youcanpetthedog #roguelike #vehiclecombat #openworld
